articleTitle: Bond-Girl und Seriendarstellerin Tanya Roberts gestorben
articleTitleTranslated: Bond girl and series actress Tanya Roberts has died
articleContent: Bond-Girl und Seriendarstellerin Tanya Roberts gestorben Im Alter von 65 Jahren. Tanya Roberts, die als Bond-Girl in "A View To A Kill", als Kurzzeit-"Engel für Charlie" und in der Serie "Die wilden 70er" bekannt wurde, ist tot.
articleContentTranslated: Bond girl and series actress Tanya Roberts dies at the age of 65. Tanya Roberts, who became known as the Bond girl in "A View To A Kill", as the short-term "Angel for Charlie" and in the series "The Wild 70s", is dead.
According to international media reports, she died at the age of 65.
